class.name: franka_effort_controller/FrankaJointTrajectoryController
class.description: The FrankaJointTrajectoryController executes Cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an effort interface.

class.name: franka_effort_controller/FrankaForceJointTrajectoryController
class.description: The FrankaForceJointTrajectoryController executes Cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an effort interface.

class.description: The FrankaCarImpJointTrajectoryController executes Cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an effort interface.
